name: Deck AR
description:
Playing Arts is a deck of cards made in a open contest for artists.
I bought it to support a friend work.
Find it here

After several projects I did observed that it is boring to reset all the time the trackers on Vuforia from project to project. So I did scan Playing Arts deck and added the cards to the trackers database.

Since then, I used it in three prototypes and in students lecture.

How to use it

Demo 

This publication is a demo of the tool.
Find all the downloadables, demo and information here:
https://eloiprojectlink.page.link/2017_12_29_DeckAR
All my games & tools at 1€/m on eloistree.com
